title: Good Work Riot (OCE Chill Fam!)
body:
RIOT IS WORKING TO FIX THE PROBLEM!!
Please sit in your chair play games and bloody chill, They are working to keep this game up for you and there is problems popping up all the time mostly you don't know about but not major ones like these make people so mad or get angry over nothing please just chill and wait for it to be fixed no need 500000 posts on boards annoying us and everyone that looks on here for information that's why they make the yellow ! pop up so you can see they are working on it! 

Other hand Good job riot keep working no need to rush :)

replies.body: It's nice what you're saying & all, but being level 24 and unable to play ranked, i cannot speak to my teammates in the chat, which makes the team comp chaos with like 3 down bot and no jg

> [{quoted}](name=LevvyLeviticus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IAs6Nm9R,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-22T06:21:35.335+0000)
>
> It's nice what you're saying & all, but being level 24 and unable to play ranked, i cannot speak to my teammates in the chat, which makes the team comp chaos with like 3 down bot and no jg

Yeah i see your pain my friend i've experienced that but being a support mainish i didn't have to worry as everyone wanted carry roles but as they dont know supports can carry :). It will work out once you get level 30 in the mean time worry about yourself and learning different things about the game don't worry about what others are doing :)
Good one, clubs have been disabled for a week now, I doubt they'll be working on this much.

>Back on Friday we experienced an unexpected event that took down clubs: One of our automated tools incorrectly identified clubs as being inactive, shutting down the service. Adding to the problem, our initial backup solutions and recovery plans weren’t enough, which delayed our ability to return clubs to a functioning state.

[Sometimes things take a little while. ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)

> [{quoted}](name=DapperToast,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IAs6Nm9R,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-22T05:09:41.273+0000)
>
> Good one, clubs have been disabled for a week now, I doubt they'll be working on this much.

Honestly i've seen no problem with clubs and no clubs legit you talk to them, unless you have one of those "mains" for people who main certain champs and just in there for the tag. i didn't really mean the clubs just the friends list and hex tech like yeah i would love to talk to people in league chat but i have discord i talk to them on there or i can deal with playing alone (cause thats me basicly the whole season :,( . Hex tech i would love for level 6+7 plus other stuff like the championship  jewels but yeah in general everyone can deal with not having these cause we didn't have them in season 4 or 5 so why so sudden everyone is angry.
